title: Schwab Trading Activity Index retreats to two-year low the same month tariffs announced | $NFLX $AMZN $SCHW $BA $NVDA
explanation:
The news indicates a retreat in Schwab's trading activity index to a two-year low. This suggests reduced revenue generation from trading commissions for Schwab in the short term, leading to a negative investor reaction within the 60-minute window. The explicit mention of "two-year low" heightens the negative sentiment and potential for immediate price decline.
